title: HDB Approval & Compliance
requirement: Agreement states lease is subject to HDB approval; tenants/occupiers must comply with HDB rules and hold valid passes (â‰¥6 months). Landlord to provide HDB T&Cs.
keywords: HDB approval; occupancy limits; immigration pass; valid pass; 6 months; compliance; T&Cs
notes: Without HDB approval the lease is invalid; non-compliance can trigger termination.

title: Lease Term
requirement: Exact start and end dates; minimum 6 months term for HDB.
keywords: lease term; start date; end date; duration; 6 months
cea_standard: Yes, specific dates and duration required

title: Rent Payment
requirement: Monthly rent amount; payment due date (e.g., 1st); payment method specified.
keywords: rent; monthly; due date; payment method

title: Security Deposit
requirement: Deposit amount; refund period (typically 14 days after lease end); conditions for deductions; cannot use deposit for last monthâ€™s rent.
keywords: security deposit; refund; 14 days; deductions; final rent
notes: Refund within 14 days; deductions after 14 daysâ€™ notice to rectify breach.

title: Problem-Free Period
requirement: Define problem-free period (typically 30 days) where landlord must rectify defects found at start.
keywords: problem-free; defects; 30 days; rectification

title: Minor Repairs
requirement: Specific cost threshold (e.g., $150â€“$200). Tenant pays up to threshold; landlord pays excess unless tenant at fault.
keywords: minor repairs; threshold; 150; 200; excess

title: Air-Conditioner Maintenance
requirement: Tenant responsible for regular servicing (e.g., quarterly) by qualified contractor at own expense; keep receipts.
keywords: aircon; servicing; quarterly; receipts; maintenance

title: Landlord Access
requirement: Require prior written notice period (e.g., 48 hours) for inspections, repairs, or viewings (non-emergency).
keywords: landlord access; 48 hours; notice; inspections; viewings

title: Quiet Enjoyment
requirement: Guarantee tenantâ€™s right to peaceably hold and enjoy the property without unreasonable interruption.
keywords: quiet enjoyment; peaceably hold; interruption; nuisance

title: Subletting
requirement: Explicitly prohibit subletting without landlordâ€™s written consent and HDB approval.
keywords: subletting; consent; HDB approval

title: Pets
requirement: Address pets; require landlord consent; subject to HDB rules.
keywords: pets; consent; HDB rules
notes: Clarify strict rules for HDB flats.

title: Diplomatic / Break Clause
requirement: If applicable, specify conditions (job loss/transfer), minimum stay, notice, and compensation for early termination by tenant.
keywords: diplomatic clause; break clause; early termination; notice; compensation

title: Inventory List & Property Condition Report
requirement: Require Inventory List (landlord) and Property Condition Report (tenant) at start; both signed.
keywords: inventory list; condition report; annexure B; annexure C
notes: Essential evidence vs fair wear and tear.

title: End of Tenancy Obligations
requirement: Specify tenant move-out duties (condition, removal of items, professional cleaning of curtains), return of keys, utilities continuity.
keywords: end of tenancy; handover; cleaning; keys; utilities

title: Utilities & Service Charges
requirement: Tenant responsible for payment of utilities (water, electricity, gas, internet) and any service charges; proof of payment may be requested.
keywords: utilities; electricity; water; gas; internet; payment

title: Insurance Requirements
requirement: Tenant required to maintain renterÕs insurance or HDB-mandated coverage for personal belongings and liabilities.
keywords: insurance; renter; HDB coverage; liability

title: Renovation / Alterations
requirement: Tenant cannot make structural alterations or major renovations without landlordÕs written consent and HDB approval.
keywords: renovation; alteration; consent; HDB

title: Dispute Resolution
requirement: Outline process for resolving disputes (mediation, CEA, arbitration) before legal action.
keywords: dispute resolution; mediation; arbitration; CEA

title: Early Termination by Landlord
requirement: Conditions under which landlord may terminate lease early (e.g., breach, sale, personal occupancy); notice period specified.
keywords: early termination; landlord; notice; breach; sale
notes: Balance landlord rights with tenant protection

title: Visitor Policy
requirement: Specify rules for overnight guests, number of visitors, and HDB compliance
keywords: visitors; overnight; HDB rules; limits

title: Governing Law & Jurisdiction
requirement: Specify that lease is governed by Singapore law; disputes handled under local courts or CEA.
keywords: governing law; jurisdiction; Singapore; CEA
